index_name.title: Index Name
index_name.description: Specify a name of the index, which will be downloaded from Elasticsearch instance. Use placeholder {{date}} to replace the placeholder with date value.

request_body.title: Request Body
request_body.description: Request body (in JSON), which will be sent together with a request. Allows to specify returned columns and other useful parameters. See Search API documentation for all possible attributes.

date.title: Date Placeholder Replacement
date.description: If placeholder {{date}} is used in the index name, it will be automatically replaced by settings specified below.

shift.title: Date Shift
shift.description: Specify date in absolute format (YYYY-MM-DD) or relative format (yesterday, 3 days ago, etc.).

format.title: Date Format
format.description: Specifies the date format, in which the date placeholder will be replaced. See strftime documentation for supported formats.

storage_table.title: Output Table Name
storage_table.description: Name of the output table in storage.

primary_keys.title: Primary Keys
primary_keys.description: Specify primary keys for the storage table.

incremental.title: Load Type
incremental.description: Whether to load data into storage incrementally, or utilizing the full load.
